title: Was Issy Dunbar discovered alive in the crane during her funeral?
subtitle: In 1915, Essy Dunbar was declared dead after a seizure. The legend says she found out she was alive in the middle of burying her.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: A 30-year-old woman was partially buried during a funeral in 1915 just to find her sad sister alive inside the coffin.
